summary: Changes/improves the enchantments on the Dark Brotherhood's Shrouded Armor.
descriptionHtml:
Changes/improves the enchantments on the Dark Brotherhood's Shrouded Armor. This replaces the existing Shrouded Armor (NOT A RE-TEXTURE yet ;p)

Cowl:
Bows do 50% more damage
Increases your health by 30 points
Increases your stamina by 30 points

Armor:
Increases Armor Rating by 50 points
Sneaking is 30% better
Carrying capacity increased by 100 points

Gloves:
Backstab does double damage
Pickpocket success is 30% better
Prices are 30% better

Boots:
Wearer is muffled and moves silently
Lockpicking is 30% easier
Increases Magic Resistance by 50%

Armor Ratings:
Cowl - 22
Armor - 46
Gloves - 17
Boots - 17

All pieces weigh nothing

Known issues:
- Shrouded Gloves only displays Backstab as an enchantment (the other two enchantments still show up in active effects and appear to be working)
- Armor Rating appears to be way higher than i set it to (I think this might just be because of my Light Armor skill)


This is my first mod so feedback is welcome

Ps: does anyone know how to make leveled enchantments/armor ratings?
author: david376
